regression_tests.name: mae
regression_tests.description: Compares with MAE of the reference data. Alerts with a difference of 10%.

regression_tests.name: rmse
regression_tests.description: Compares with RMSE of the reference data. Alerts with a difference of 10%.

regression_tests.name: mean_error
regression_tests.description: Compares with mean error of the reference data (or expected value of 0).

regression_tests.name: mape
regression_tests.description: Compares with MAPE of the reference data. Alerts with a difference of 10%.

regression_tests.name: absolute_max_error
regression_tests.description: Compares with Absolute Max Error of the reference data. Alerts with a difference of 10%.

regression_tests.name: r2
regression_tests.description: Compares with R2 of the reference data. Alerts with a difference of 10%.

classification_tests.name: accuracy
classification_tests.description: Compares with accuracy of the reference data. Alerts with a difference of 20%.

classification_tests.name: precision
classification_tests.description: Compares with precision/PPV of the reference data. Alerts with a difference of 20%.

classification_tests.name: recall
classification_tests.description: Compares with recall/sensitivity/TPR of the reference data. Alerts with a difference of 20%.

classification_tests.name: f1
classification_tests.description: Compares with f1 score of the reference data. Alerts with a difference of 20%.

classification_tests.name: specificity
classification_tests.description: Compares with specificity/tnr of the reference data. Alerts with a difference of 20%.

classification_tests.name: fpr
classification_tests.description: Compares with fpr/type 1 error rate of the reference data. Alerts with a difference of 20%.

classification_tests.name: fnr
classification_tests.description: Compares with fnr/type 2 error of the reference data. Alerts with a difference of 20%.

classification_tests.name: roc_auc
classification_tests.description: Compares with ROC AUC of the reference data. Alerts with a difference of 20% or < 0.5.
